author: Nathaniel Crabbe
title: Akufo-Addo Extends Easter Greetings To Ghanaians As He Urges Prayer And Safety Amid Celebrations - YEN.COM.GH
text: Akufo-Addo Extends Easter Greetings To Ghanaians As He Urges Prayer And Safety Amid Celebrations - President Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo has extended heartfelt wishes to Ghanaians to mark Easter - A post on Facebook spreads love and hopes the blood shed on the cross during Easter would bring healing to the nation - The uplifting message of the president resonated deeply as it sparked heartwarming comments and solidarity across social media The President of the Republic of Ghana, Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo, has extended warm greetings to Ghanaians to commemorate the [Easter](https://yen.com.gh/tags/easter/). In his heartfelt message, delivered on behalf of his wife, Rebecca Akufo-Addo, his children, [family](https://yen.com.gh/tags/family/), and his administration, he expressed optimism that the importance of the blood shed on the cross during Easter would bring healing to the nation and cleanse it of sins. Akufo-Addo urges safety [The president](https://yen.com.gh/politics/231460-easter-akufo-addo-urges-christians-reflect-christs-sacrifice-hope-brings-celebration) emphasised the importance of safety during this festive season, urging everyone to drive safely and keep the country in their prayers. He encouraged Ghanaians to adhere to safety measures while participating in Easter conventions, parties, picnics, and traditional Kwahu Easter celebrations. Ibrahim Mahama: Businessman rides motorbike in remembrance of his late friend, fans moved by his humility PAY ATTENTION: [Click ‚ÄúSee First‚Äù under the ‚ÄúFollowing‚Äù tab to see YEN.com.gh News on your News Feed!](https://yen.com.gh/188918-new-facebook-algorithm-how-yen-news-newsfeed-now.html) [Akufo-Addo‚Äôs message](https://yen.com.gh/ghana/205969-easter-akufo-addo-urges-ghanaians-to-act-responsibly-safely-during-celebration) emphasised the spiritual significance of Easter, stating that the celebration of Jesus Christ‚Äôs crucifixion and resurrection should usher in a new season marked by faith, hope, growth, prosperity, reconciliation, and sacrifice for everyone in Ghana and worldwide. Read the complete [statement here](https://web.facebook.com/photo/?). Akufo-Addo sparks a wave of reactions [The president‚Äôs](https://twitter.com/NAkufoAddo?) Easter message elicited a wave of reactions online as netizens shared their thoughts and sentiments on the heartfelt [wishes](https://yen.com.gh/108583-good-luck-wishes-exam-girlfriend.html). Mabel Oti-Boadi said: Amen, and a Happy birthday to you. God has really been faithful to you. Remain blessed, Mr President. Victor Asiedu-Young commented: Happy Easter celebration to you as well. Stay blessed, YE, Mr President. Christian Alan Aggrey Amen. Happy Easter Easter and happy birthday, sir. Many more years. Ohene Bruce wrote: Black Princesses captain Afi Amenyeku presents gold medal from African Games 2023 to her proud father Amen, daddy. [Kwadwo](https://yen.com.gh/facts-lifehacks/biographies/205690-kwadwo-nkansah-lilwin-age-net-worth-movies-house-cars-latest-updates/) Agyekum Thank you, sir, wishing you a happy Easter and birthday as well Mr President Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo. Akufo-Addo launches Ghana Smart Schools project YEN.com.gh previously reported that President Akufo-Addo has unveiled plans to distribute smart tablets to 1.3 million Senior High School (SHS) students nationwide. This forms part of the [president‚Äôs vision](https://yen.com.gh/education/254302-akufo-addo-ghana-smart-schools-project-one-student-one-laptop) to equip students under the free SHS policy with essential technological skills through the Ghana Smart Schools Project. PAY ATTENTION: [Stay informed and follow us on Google News!](https://news.google.com/publications/CAAiED-kkM3VetXoUfGei2K5uIIqFAgKIhA_pJDN1XrV6FHxnotiubiC?hl=en-US&gl=US&ceid=US%3Aen) Source: YEN.com.gh

author: Yolanda Canales
title: Los maquinistas piden comprensi√≥n a los usuarios: "No somos culpables de los problemas de Rodalies"
text:
Movilidad
Los maquinistas piden comprensi√≥n a los usuarios: "No somos culpables de los problemas de Rodalies"
Defienden que prima la seguridad y denuncian que falta material rodante
Barcelona - Publicado el
3 min lectura
La consejera de Territorio, S√≠lvia Paneque, ha reconocido que un 24% de los trenes de Rodalies est√°n fuera de servicio. Pero tambi√©n ha destacado otros "puntos cr√≠ticos", como la falta de maquinistas, o de personal ferroviario en los talleres. Y hablando de maquinistas, en concreto, hay que tener en cuenta que el 80% de los que trabajan en Rodalies son de fuera de Catalu√±a, y est√°n ah√≠ una media de tres a√±os. Para ser maquinista en Renfe se debe superar una oposici√≥n, despu√©s de pasar un curso de nueve meses de duraci√≥n y que cuesta unos 22.000 euros. Curso que se puede hacer en una escuela privada o en la Escuela T√©cnica Profesional de Conducci√≥n y Operaciones que Renfe tiene en L'Hospitalet de Llobregat. Antes, sin embargo, se ha tenido que pasar una prueba.
Todo ello para conseguir una licencia de maquinista que, por ejemplo, no tienen los conductores de trenes, de la l√≠nea Llobregat Anoia o del Vall√®s, de Ferrocarriles de la Generalitat. Y ah√≠ radica uno de los problemas que ven los maquinistas en el traspaso de Rodalies a la Generalitat: tener que pasar un curso caro y exigente para poder circular solo por unas cuantas v√≠as (porque las l√≠neas de Cercan√≠as traspasadas quedar√≠an fuera de la Red Ferroviaria de Inter√©s General). Y despu√©s est√° el sueldo, que puede oscilar entre los 21.000 y los 48.000 euros, m√°s los pluses, sueldos m√°s elevados que en FGC.
Hemos hablado con maquinistas. Nos han dicho que cuesta mucho venir al n√∫cleo de Cercan√≠as en Barcelona, por el civismo (en Catalu√±a se registran la mitad de actos inc√≠vicos de los que se producen en todos los n√∫cleos de Cercan√≠as de Espa√±a); por los atropellos, tambi√©n aqu√≠ se dan m√°s, y, evidentemente por el elevado coste de vida. Todo influye. Tambi√©n piden comprensi√≥n. No es culpa de ellos que un tren, por ejemplo, no salga por la ma√±ana. Como en el caso del avi√≥n deben realizar comprobaciones y no se garantiza la seguridad, aquel tren no puede circular.
Ariadna se presentar√° a las oposiciones para renfe
Hemos hablado con Ariadna, una maquinista, ya tiene la licencia, y el pr√≥ximo 5 de abril se presentar√° a las oposiciones para entrar en Renfe. Y superar a la oposici√≥n, adem√°s de que no es f√°cil, no garantiza conseguir una plaza. De hecho, en la anterior convocatoria ella la aprob√≥, pero no consigui√≥ entrar. En cualquier caso, s√≠ que tiene su licencia de maquinista y puede trabajar en una empresa privada de mercanc√≠as o tambi√©n de pasajeros, una licencia que le permite circular por la Red Ferroviaria de Inter√©s General, y tambi√©n por Europa.
√âsta es una de las cuestiones por las que los maquinistas de Renfe no quieren el traspaso, por no limitar su operatividad, porque las l√≠neas traspasadas quedar√≠an fuera de esta red. Lo de entrada, despu√©s tambi√©n est√° el sueldo. Es por eso, seg√∫n nos dice Ariadna, que maquinistas catalanes, y que no son precisamente pocos dentro de Renfe, se marchan a otros n√∫cleos de cercan√≠as.
Ella ha hecho pr√°cticas en Rodalies, como parte de su formaci√≥n. Reconoce que la experiencia fue agotadora. Se encontraba con situaciones muy complicadas, como obst√°culos o personas caminando por la zona de v√≠as, a lo que hay que a√±adir la incomprensi√≥n de la gente que a menudo la recib√≠a con gritos o cortes de manga. Por eso pide comprensi√≥n. Adem√°s, deja claro que un maquinista no puede llegar tarde voluntariamente al trabajo. Si un tren no sale, dice, es porque despu√©s de realizar las comprobaciones oportunas puede ser, nos dice, no re√∫ne las condiciones de seguridad. Como, por ejemplo, que por culpa de un grafiti, desde el exterior, no se pueda ver la ventana de emergencia.
.

author: Jake Hardiman
title: The 10 In-Flight Irritants That Most Annoy Airline Passengers
text: For the most part, flying in the modern era is enjoyable. With competition and the low-cost boom having made traveling by air an affordable venture, and improvements in passenger experience taking the ergonomic and gastronomic side of things to the next level, a good flight nowadays can really restore your faith in the modern aviation industry. However, this can't always be the case.

author: Aaron Ryan
title: New York Jets QB Aaron Rodgers Says He Expects ‚ÄúGreatness‚Äù In His Monday Night Football Return From Torn Achilles | Whiskey Riff
text: For the sake of my fantasy team, I hope he‚Äôs right. All eyes will be on New York Jets quarterback [Aaron Rodgers](http://whiskeyriff.com/tag/aaron-rodgers) on Monday night to see how he performs in his long-awaited NFL return. The 40-year old QB signed with the Jets in 2023 after spending 18 seasons with the Green Bay Packers, but went down with a torn Achilles on the fourth snap with his new team, forcing him to miss the entire season as he recovered. After videos surfaced last season of Rodgers throwing bombs during practice, and seemingly putting full weight on his injured leg, there was a lot of talk that his miraculous recovery might have allowed him to return for the end of the 2023 season. But once the Jets were eliminated from playoff contention, Rodgers took the rest of the season to heal and get ready to make his return this year. And he‚Äôs got high expectations for himself. The Jets play the San Francisco 49ers on Monday Night Football for week 1, and Rodgers spoke to the media today about how he‚Äôs going to feel stepping out onto the field after being knocked out so early last year ‚Äì especially after he gets past the fourth snap: ‚ÄúThere might be a little smirk after the fourth one, I dunno. We‚Äôll see. I‚Äôm sure they‚Äôll catch it. But I‚Äôm in a good mindspace. Really had a year to remember, in a lot of ways, some really difficult things but some great things as well.‚Äù [#Jets]QB Aaron Rodgers told Rich Cimini of ESPN that he might give a smirk after getting past the 4th play in Week 1 vs the [#49ers]on Monday Night Football. Said he‚Äôs sure the cameras will catch it. ü§£ üé• [@nyjets] [#JetUp] [pic.twitter.com/kt9jDzUzlx] ‚Äî Paul Andrew Esden Jr (@BoyGreen25) [September 5, 2024] And though he missed (basically) an entire season, that doesn‚Äôt mean that Rodgers is going to cut himself any slack: ‚ÄúI have a lot of pride in my performance. When I take the field, I expect greatness. Because I‚Äôve done it before, so that‚Äôs kind of the standard I hold myself to.‚Äù "When I take the field, I expect greatness" ‚Äì Aaron Rodgers [pic.twitter.com/BIh9J0iDp9] ‚Äî Jets Videos (@snyjets) [September 5, 2024] I‚Äôve got Rodgers on my Fantasy Football bench, just waiting to go in if he comes back and sets the world on fire. So I really hope that he can live up to his own expectations this season. But regardless, man it‚Äôs good to have football back again.

author: Newsroom
title: Nicaragua arrests two high-ranking Catholic priests with close ties to cardinal - In-Cyprus
text:
Nicaraguan police detained on Thursday two senior Catholic priests who are close to the country‚Äôs top church leader, a person with knowledge of the matter said, raising to at least six the number of clergymen detained this week.
The source, who declined to be named for fear of arrest, said the two priests were detained for publicly praying for jailed Bishop Rolando Alvarez, the most prominent critic of President Daniel Ortega.
Local media outlet Confidencial named the priests as Carlos Aviles and Hector Treminio, and noted that their arrest brings to at least six the number of priests detained over the past week, adding that two of the clerics had already been released.
The government‚Äôs press office did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
Over the past few years, Ortega‚Äôs government has targeted members of the Catholic church, a crackdown officials have in the past said was needed to punish treasonous behavior or other alleged crimes.
Aviles is the second-highest ranking cleric in the Archdiocese of Managua, led by Cardinal Leopoldo Brenes, while Treminio is its treasurer.
Alvarez, the bishop of Matagalpa, forcefully criticized the government‚Äôs deadly response to mass protests that broke out in 2018, and was convicted of treason and sentenced to a 26-year prison term earlier this year.
Last week, police arrested Bishop Isidro Mora of the Siuna diocese, making him the second bishop to be detained after Alvarez‚Äôs detention in 2022.
Many of the latest clergymen detained were arrested because they publicly offered prayers for Alvarez, according to the source and local media, but the government has not issued any statements explaining the priests‚Äô alleged crimes.
Nicaraguan Bishop Silvio Baez, who has been living in exile in Florida since 2019 and is the second-ranking leader of the archdiocese, called for the priests to be released.
‚ÄúI ask God to protect them and that they be freed immediately!‚Äù wrote in a post on X on Thursday.
According to exiled Nicaraguan researcher Martha Patricia Molina, who publishes records of what she describes as the persecution of the Catholic Church under Ortega, the number of bishops, priests and seminarians behind bars in the country currently stands at nine.
(Reuters)

text:

author: VNExplorer
title: El FMI celebr√≥ las metas alcanzadas por el gobierno de Milei y dijo qu√© hace falta para un nuevo acuerdo
text: El FMI celebr√≥ las metas alcanzadas por el gobierno de Milei y dijo qu√© hace falta para un nuevo acuerdo "En este momento no hay una tabla de tiempo espec√≠fica para estas discusiones‚Äù, dijo la portavoz del Fondo Monetario Internacional Julie Kozcak al ser consultada por la posibilidad de un nuevo acuerdo con el pa√≠s y si existe alguna fecha aproximada. ‚ÄúComo ya mencionamos, nuestro intercambio permanece frecuente y constructivo", asegur√≥ la vocera y dio los lineamientos de qu√© tiene qu√© suceder para que cristalice un nuevo acuerdo:"El personal intercambiar√° en las discusiones sobre un nuevo acuerdo potencial, como lo har√≠amos con cualquier miembro del FMI, una vez que las autoridades formalmente lo soliciten. Y en este momento no hay una tabla de tiempo espec√≠fica para estas discusiones‚Äù. La Directora del Departamento de Comunicaciones del Fondo Monetario Internacional, Julie Kozack, en su conferencia de prensa habitual se refiri√≥ a la situaci√≥n de la Argentina y a la posibilidad de que el pa√≠s pueda alcanzar un nuevo acuerdo con el organismo, al tiempo que hizo algunas consideraciones sobre el camino que lleva adelante el gobierno de Javier Milei en materia econ√≥mica. En una entrevista radial de este jueves 11 de julio, el ministro de Econom√≠a Luis Caputo confirm√≥ que est√°n en marcha las negociaciones con el FMI por un nuevo acuerdo, al tiempo que adelant√≥ en la charla con Eduardo Feinman por Radio Mitre, que espera tener un nuevo programa ‚Äúantes de fin de a√±o‚Äù. En esa l√≠nea aclar√≥ que vendr√°n ‚Äúfondos frescos‚Äù. ‚ÄúEl FMI recibi√≥ con benepl√°cito el nuevo programa monetario y lo aprob√≥ en 48 horas‚Äù, revel√≥ el ministro de Econom√≠a. Sobre el nuevo acuerdo con el Fondo dijo: ‚ÄúEstamos empezando hablar del nuevo acuerdo, pensar (en llegar a un acuerdo) en septiembre es mucho, pero seguro este a√±o‚Äù. En desarollo...

author: Hannah Singleton
title: Best Climbing Harnesses 2024 - Forbes Vetted
text:
Though the climbing world has long been captivated by the daring feats of elite free soloists the likes of Peter Croft, Alex Honnold and Marc-Andr√© Leclerc, safety comes first for the rest of us. And for the everyday climber looking to make the most of their time on the wall, the journey begins with the right gear. While carabiners, crag packs and chalk bags have their place, a comfortable and reliable climbing harness is the cornerstone of any climber's toolkit.
Gone are the days of uncomfortable harness designs‚Äîand good riddance. Over the years, technology and innovation has helped the industry develop some of the best climbing harnesses that are lightweight, breathable, functional and comfortable to hang out in for hours on end. And most importantly, you can trust each of them on the wall, so all you have to concentrate on is the crux move.
Navigating through the array of harness innovations can be challenging, especially if you don‚Äôt know what to look for. For example, what distinguishes a harness suitable for sport climbing from one designed for multi-pitch? This guide dissects these distinctions, examining top contenders like the sleek Petzl Sitta that‚Äôs tailored for sport climbing enthusiasts and the robust Misty Mountain Cadillac , ideal for trad climbing purists.
Below, we‚Äôve identified the industry‚Äôs seven best harnesses, drawing insights from numerous reviews, community feedback and hands-on testing. This comprehensive roundup aids both beginners and seasoned climbers in finding the perfect harness for their projects this season.
Best Climbing Harness Overall: Petzl Adjama Best Climbing Harness For Sport Climbing: Petzl Sitta Best Climbing Harness For Gym Climbing: Black Diamond Solution Best Climbing Harness For Alpine Climbing: Arc‚Äôteryx AR-395a Best Climbing Harness For Beginners: C.A.M.P. Energy CR3 Package Best Climbing Harness For Trad Climbing: Misty Mountain Cadillac Most Comfortable Climbing Harness: Black Diamond Long Haul
Best Climbing Harness Overall Trusty, Versatile And Comfortable
Petzl Adjama Size Range: S‚ÄîXL | Weight: 1.06 pounds (medium) | Gear Loops: 5 | Adjustable Leg Loops: Yes
When you want to balance performance, comfort, versatility and price, the Petzl Adjama stands out as a top-tier choice for climbers of all abilities and styles. This harness is a true all-rounder, combining the robustness required for rugged terrain with the lightness needed for fast ascents. And it has features that both sport climbers and trad climbers will love: The foam padding is comfy and durable, and the five loops and haul loop allow you ample storage room. The gear loops are rigid enough to make unclipping draws easy, but flexible enough and staggered that they don‚Äôt get in the way during your ascent of that awkward chimney route.
But where this harness really shines is its comfort. The leg loops are fully adjustable, and the foam padding is wider in the back to disperse weight and reduce pressure points. This is the harness I use for long, casual days out with friends, when I don‚Äôt want to worry about something bulky and uncomfortable around my waist as I‚Äôm hanging out at the crag. It‚Äôs also served me well on multi-pitch alpine climbs in Washington when I need to load up on gear but didn‚Äôt want it to get caught on my backpack. Overall, this is a versatile harness at a moderate price point for every climber.
Pros:
Comfortable, squishy padding A whole lot of gear loops Highly adjustable leg loops Cons:
Slightly heavier than specialized sport climbing harnesses Can be overkill for gym use Best Climbing Harness For Sport Climbing Easy To Carry No Matter How Far It Is To The Crag
Petzl Sitta Size Range: S‚ÄîL | Weight: 0.59 pounds (medium) | Gear Loops: 4 | Adjustable Leg Loops: No
Sport climbing requires agility and finesse, so for sport climbers who push the limits on steep and technical routes, the Petzl Sitta is a game-changer. Its design features ultra-lightweight construction that packs down small to barely take up any room in your backpack, so you‚Äôll have extra space for your rope and draws for your long approach. Once you get to the crag, the harness‚Äôs sleek profile and minimal bulk provide the freedom of movement you need for your project, whether you need to stand up on a high foot or get a heel hook in that distant hueco.
Four gear loops (two in the front and two smaller ones in the back) allow for easy access, so you can move intuitively as you clip bolts. Despite its minimalist design, durability isn‚Äôt compromised, so it will stay looking fresh pitch after pitch. Although it‚Äôs an investment at $200, the Sitta is sure to elevate your performance on the wall.
Pros:
Extremely lightweight Breathable Compact when packed Cons:
Expensive Non-adjustable leg loops Best Climbing Harness For Gym Climbing Streamlined And Simple
Black Diamond Solution Size Range: XXS‚ÄîXL | Weight: 0.69 pounds (medium) | Gear Loops: 4 | Adjustable Leg Loops: No
For climbers who love to rack up the gym mileage, the Black Diamond Solution offers an ideal blend of comfort and reliability that‚Äôs built to meet the demands of frequent indoor climbing‚Äîie, hundreds of pitches and plenty of whippers. Even under the strain of regular use, the durable construction guarantees longevity.
Its Fusion Comfort Technology incorporates three separate strands of low-profile webbing, delivering superior load distribution while reducing pressure on sensitive points. The fixed leg loops and waistband are contoured to the body, providing a snug fit without the need for constant adjustments. And the auto-locking buckles provide quick and easy adjustments (no more fiddling with annoying buckles for five minutes)‚Äîa boon for climbers who share their harness or use it for various environments.
Pros:
Comfortable for the price Durable and long-lasting Simple and easy to use Cons:
Minimal gear loops Lack of adjustability Best Climbing Harness For Alpine Climbing Lightweight, Comfortable And Versatile For Mountain Ascents
Arc'teryx AR-395a Size Range: XS‚ÄîXL | Weight: 0.87 pounds (medium) | Gear Loops: 4 | Adjustable Leg Loops: Yes
Alpine climbing requires a lot of walking‚Äîusually over boulder fields or other similarly uneven ground. So every ounce counts when you‚Äôre lugging your rope, trad rack and crampons for that early season summit. Fortunately, Arc‚Äôteryx‚Äôs AR-395a harness clocks in at under a pound but still maintains premium comfort. And it‚Äôs no surprise that this design is perfect for climbers tackling technical climbs, as the brand started in Northern Vancouver, close to some of the snowiest and most challenging peaks in North America.
Beyond its featherweight advantage, this harness is supremely functional and adaptable to meet the diverse demands of alpine climbing. You can adjust the leg loops to layer clothing underneath as the weather changes. Four reversible gear loops, a rear haul loop and ice clipper slots allow you to carry anything you need, from cams to nuts to ice screws. Whether you‚Äôre adventuring off-route or climbing an ice pinnacle, this harness is a solid choice.
Pros:
Very lightweight yet durable Adjustable, so you can add extra layers underneath Comfortable for all day wear thanks to the contoured bands Cons:
Expensive More features than necessary for casual climbers Best Climbing Harness For Beginners An Affordable Price Point For Newcomers
C.A.M.P. Energy CR3 Package Buy From REI Size Range: XS‚ÄîXL | Weight: 0.83 pounds (medium) | Gear Loops: 4 | Adjustable Leg Loops: Yes
Not all harnesses need a wide, cushy waistband or ultralight materials. Sometimes, all you need is a good, durable harness that will get you through a day of gym top-roping in total comfort. (Especially if you‚Äôre a beginner and you don‚Äôt want to drop a bunch of dough before you‚Äôre even sure if you‚Äôll love the sport.)
Well, that‚Äôs where C.A.M.P.‚Äôs Energy harness comes in. You could buy the entire package pictured above and find yourself prepared with all the gear you need for gym climbing (besides climbing shoes of course). But if you already have a belay device and only need a harness , it will run you just $50.
Pros:
Adjustable waistband Durable construction Great price point for beginners Cons:
Buckles aren‚Äôt the smoothest Not comfortable for hanging Best Climbing Harness For Trad Climbing Don't Be Fooled By The Outdated Design
Misty Mountain Cadillac Buy From Moosejaw Size Range: XS‚ÄîXXXL | Weight: 1.13 pounds (medium) | Gear Loops: 6 | Adjustable Leg Loops: Yes
Okay, this isn‚Äôt the sleekest harness out there. In classic Misty Mountain fashion, it looks like it was designed 30 years ago and never updated. But trust us: The Misty Mountain Cadillac is widely regarded in the trad community for its exceptional blend of durability, functionality and comfort because it is designed specifically with the trad climber in mind, offering storage and support that is crucial for long, gear-intensive routes.
The Cadillac features a wide, padded waistbelt and leg loops that provide sustained comfort during extended periods of wear, a vital attribute for the lengthy belays required in multi-pitch climbing. Six gear loops adorn this harness, all ideally positioned for easy access and organization of all of your cams, cordelette, nuts, hexes, carabiners, slings and other necessities. And, unlike any other harness on this list, it comes in an extended size range from XS to XXXL.
Pros:
The most size-inclusive harness on this list Ample gear storage with six loops Superior comfort through the waistband and leg loops Cons:
Overkill for casual use Pricey Most Comfortable Climbing Harness Designed For Hanging
Black Diamond Long Haul Size Range: S‚ÄîXL | Weight: 1.40 pounds (medium) | Gear Loops: 5 | Adjustable Leg Loops: Yes
Certain tasks require you to spend all day in a harness‚Äîmulti-pitch climbing, rappeling or photo or video work on a rope. And if you‚Äôve ever done this, you know how uncomfortable it can be. In these instances, your average harness won‚Äôt provide enough support or have enough padding for all-day wear. If you have to hang in your harness more than you climb in it, you‚Äôll want a harness designed for the job.
The hallmark feature of the Black Diamond Long Haul is the generous, dual-density foam padding in both the waistband and leg loops, which cradles you and contours nicely to the body. It was also meticulously designed to reduce pressure points and distribute weight evenly, no matter how heavy you and your gear may be. When you load it up with gear, you don‚Äôt have that nagging sharpness above your hip bone or annoying digging into the skin. While it is slightly bulkier than minimalist models, that‚Äôs a small trade-off for the supreme comfort it provides.
Pros:
Great weight distribution for all-day wear Excellent padding Super durable Cons:
Heavy Thick padding makes it large and awkward to carry Not as breathable as some other models

author: Jack Hardy
title: Auschwitz survivor, 100, says a letter from King Charles made her feel 'very humbled' after a 'touching' personal gesture from the monarch | Daily Mail Online
text: An Auschwitz survivor has described feeling 'very humbled' to receive a personal letter and flowers from the King to mark her 100th birthday. Lily Ebert had expected to be sent the traditional congratulatory telegram from the monarch when she turned 100 today, but instead was surprised by the 'touching' personal gesture. Since she was deported from her home in Hungary to the notorious Auschwitz-Birkenau death camp aged 20 in 1944 ‚Äì where her mother, brother and sister were killed in the gas chambers ‚Äì Ms Ebert has committed her life to raising awareness about the Holocaust. She had made a promise to herself that she would 'tell the world what had happened' and her memoir, Lily's Promise, became an international bestseller. The King wrote the foreword to the book and decided to send a heartfelt personal message to Ms Ebert after being told of the milestone by her family. Auschwitz survivor Lily Ebert has described feeling 'very humbled' to receive a personal letter and flowers from the King to mark her 100th birthday Lily Ebert had expected to be sent the traditional congratulatory telegram from the monarch when she turned 100 today, but instead was surprised by the 'touching' personal gesture The letter said: 'Dear Lily, I particularly wanted to write a personal word on the very special occasion of your 100th birthday‚Ä¶ 'The terrible suffering which you and your family endured can never be adequately described or acknowledged, but as a survivor of the horrors of those years, your life's work has been to remind our generation of the depths of depravity and evil to which humankind can descend, when reason, humanity and truth are abandoned. 'By continuing to remind the world of the unimaginable atrocities which you witnessed, you have lived your life positively, with true nobility and without hatred, in a way that is an example to us all. 'Your extraordinary strength of spirit, resilience and courage is admired more than I can possibly say. 'I do hope that you have a very happy day in the company of your family and friends, and this brings you countless thoughts and blessings on such a memorable anniversary.' The letter ‚Äî signed by the King 'with very special and warmest wishes' ‚Äî was also accompanied by a bouquet of flowers and the traditional 100th birthday telegram signed by the King and Queen. Ms Ebert said: 'I was surprised and very humbled when my great-grandson Dov informed me that the King had taken the time to write a personal and heartfelt letter for my 100th birthday. 'Never in my wildest dreams did I imagine surviving Auschwitz, let alone starting a family and reaching the age of 100, only to be honoured in such a meaningful way. Ms Ebert was deported from her home in Hungary to the notorious Auschwitz-Birkenau death camp aged 20 in 1944 ‚Äì where her mother, brother and sister were killed in the gas chambers 'The memories of my mother, youngest brother, and sister, who were murdered in the gas chambers of Auschwitz-Birkenau on July 9, 1944, weigh heavy on days like today. 'Alongside 100 other members of my extended family, they were senselessly killed simply because of the religion they were born into. 'Receiving this touching gesture from Their Majesties has deeply moved me.' Ms Ebert met Charles, then Prince of Wales, at the Queen's Gallery in London as portraits of herself and six other Holocaust survivors were unveiled in January 2022. The paintings were commissioned by Charles as patron of the National Holocaust Memorial Day Trust. She received an MBE for services to Holocaust education at Windsor Castle in January this year.
